title: Episode 18 w/ Kenny Anderson
itunes:title: Episode 18 w/ Kenny Anderson
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with basketball legend Kenny Anderson. Kenny, who's also from N.O.R.E.'s neighborhood of Lefrak City Queens, tells stories about a young N.O.R.E., being one of the first basketball players that proudly represented hip hop, and his vast career going back to his college days. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
